segments.text: The woman stands there, oblivious to the mess accumulating around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t fathom how she can concentrate so completely on drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is practically a waterfall at this point, and my heart sinks at the thought of what could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children working together in secret, and it reminds me of my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my happiness quickly turns into concern as I realize the risks they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful; her open palm reaching for a cookie is innocent yet reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself wanting to shout a warning, but their joy holds me back.
segments.speaker: PAR
